title: Bonus 27: With Bernie from the Fan of History podcast
itunes:title: Bonus: With Bernie from the Fan of History podcast
description: This is a bonus episode for season two. Bernie Maopolski from the Fan of History podcast and I talk history podcasting and the archaeology of ancient Israel.
content:encoded: This is a bonus episode for season two. Bernie Maopolski from the Fan of History podcast and I talk history podcasting and the archaeology of ancient Israel.
itunes:subtitle: This is a bonus episode for season two. Bernie Maopolski from the Fan of History podcast and I talk history podcasting and the archaeology of ancient Israel.
itunes:author: Bernie Maopolski, Garry Stevens
